content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Add these classic games to your collection & become a master in no time. Chill out with a game of Pool test your nerve playing Poker and strategise against your opponent in Chess.

Includes:
Pure Hold'em, with 100,000 credit pack
Pure Pool with Snooker pack
Pure Chess with Park add-on

The most authentic experience you'll have from the comfort of your couch.

Pure Chess
Compatible with PlayStation®4.
397MB minimum space required
1 - 2 Players
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p 1080p

Pure Chess Park Game Pack
Compatible with PlayStation®4.
To use this download, you will need , product code CUSA00216
71.6MB minimum space required

Pure Pool
Compatible with PlayStation®4.
508MB minimum space required
1 - 2 Players
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p 1080i 1080p

Pure Pool Snooker Pack
Compatible with PlayStation®4.
To use this download, you will need , product code CUSA00332
39MB minimum space required

Pure Hold'em World Poker Championship
Compatible with PlayStation®4.
971MB minimum space required
1 Player
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p 1080i 1080p
Network Players: 2 - 8

Pure Hold'em 100,000 Credit Pack
Compatible with PlayStation®4.
To use this download, you will need , product code CUSA01103
